subtlety.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the quality that something has when it has been done in a clever or skilful way, with careful attention to small details
subtlety.translation[0].definitions[0].e: She argued her case with considerable subtlety.
subtlety.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a thought, idea, or detail that is important but difficult to notice or understand
subtlety.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Some of the subtleties of the language are lost in translation.
